document_data.name: Swan
document_data.mainbody: '''Swans''' were large waterfowl. Males were also known as cobs, females as pens, and young as cygnets.
document_data.Description: Swans were relatively large birds, with a wingspan of approximately {{SI|8|ft|long=yes}}.
document_data.Abilities: Despite their size, swans were capable of flight. They were also difficult to surprise.
document_data.Combat: Swans would attack in defense of their nest or young. They attacked by leaping and using their strong bill and wings to damage enemies. This form of attack had a chance of blinding or disorienting opponents.

Ecology.Relationships: Some [[noble djinn]] had giant-sized swans as servants and companions.

document_data.Trivia:
* The coat of arms of [[House Aelorothi]] featured a red swan against a blue backdrop.
* The coat of arms of [[Soargyl|House Soargyl]] featured a silver swan against a green backdrop.
* Seven swans flying overhead could be viewed as a [[deity]] answering "yes" to questions posed to them through the [[spell]] [[Omen (Faer√ªnian spell)|''omen'']].
